smart_goals.description: Reduce daily carb intake to 45g, as documented in the summary, by the next appointment in two weeks.
Increase daily water intake to 2000ml as per the summary and maintain it for the next month.
Perform a minimum of 30 minutes of moderate-intensity physical activity, five times a week, as recorded in the summary, for the following month.
Maintain a pre-meal blood glucose level below 150 mg/dL, as stated in the summary, throughout the next 3 months.
Take prescribed metformin medication regularly, as mentioned in the summary, for the next 3 months.
